thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 08 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-LGI Homes Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share Of $1.10

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-LGI Homes Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share Of $1.10
text:
May 8 (Reuters) - LGI Homes Inc:
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.10 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.78 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $6.00 TO $7.00 * QTRLY HOME SALES REVENUES INCREASED 71.3% TO $279.0 MILLION
* MAINTAIN OUR POSITIVE OUTLOOK ON REMAINDER OF 2018 AND REAFFIRM OUR GUIDANCE
* HOME CLOSINGS DURING Q1 OF 2018 INCREASED 63.5% TO 1,244 * BELIEVES THAT AVERAGE HOME SALES PRICE IN 2018 WILL BE BETWEEN $220,000 AND $230,000
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $6.21 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
